document_data.name: Laeris
document_data.mainbody: '''Laeris''' was a [[Painbearer]] of [[Ilmater]] and a member of the adventuring company - the [[Lady's Lament]] from [[Waterdeep]], active ''circa'' [[1310 DR]].
document_data.Description: Laeris was a contemplative and quiet man who rarely talked and asked for very little. He used a [[mace]], a [[shield]], and a [[sling]] in battle.
document_data.History:
Sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1310}}, Laeris joined the Lady's Lament, becoming the team's spiritual guiding force. He complimented the group's leader - [[Sheris Lyricist]]'s charisma with his wisdom.

In 1310 DR, the Lady's Lament, along with many other mercenaries, traveled from [[Luskan]] to the besieged city of [[Targos]] in the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
